title: An Idiot Wish to be Netorare’d in a Crazy World - Novel Updates
tags: Magic   Male Protagonist   Netorare   Netorase   Parody   Reincarnated in Another World   Sword And Magic   Transported to Another World
author: Akikan   空缶
description:
Seimei who was reincarnated in a crazy world is a true [Netorare lover]. This is a tale of his everyday struggle to get his beautiful girlfriend Kaguya NTR’d.

It is a work in which the main character dies, comes back to life, has a silly plot, hijac-… respects other works, and does whatever it wants to do foolishly.

Thank you.

That’s all.>
